summary: this is a kinda Harry Potter based question, but do you think that people who have animagus abilities (turning into one animal...
question: this is a kinda Harry Potter based question, but do you think that people who have animagus abilities (turning into one animal at will, but they dont choose the species) or metamorphmagus abilities (more open to interpretation but can change their physicality to almost anything, including hair colour, nose to a beak, but whether they can change fully is not discovered) would use those in sexual situations? especially metamorpmagus, cuz they could have an animal tongue or something. woah.
answer:
Oh definitely!! If they and their partner were into it, I assure you those wizards would use every ability they couls during sex.

I’m pretty sure rhe wizarding world would have so many different kinky sides to it. And I would so love a book series on that.

summary: Sins of the Family
title: Sins of the Family
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qr0LWD

by The_Procrastinating_Writer

Lily Potter had triplets, one boy and two girls. The next Halloween James’ mother takes the fall instead of the young couple. It is unclear who lead to the fall of Voldemort. The triplets are separated as a safety precaution. The next year Lily Potter dies.

Words: 795, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con, Underage

summary: All We Need
title: All We Need
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SKwoao

by LiburnaP

From the moment he met Evelyn Sinclair King, Sirius Black knew that there was something about her. He didn’t know if it was her blue eyes, her platinum blonde hair, her smile, her attitude or her radiating aura. But there was more than to Evelyn than Sirius expected. So much more.(SLOW BURN)

body:
Y'all I need help like rn

Guys guys guys guys

Please someone give me best Drarry recs. I crave them. I want to start reading them, but I would love for some peeps to give me their favs and the best fics first before I go blindly searching for more.

Caution, I have never read Drarry before, only fics where they are friendos.

Thank you.

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Harry and Tom meet as young medi-wizards, both hoping to one day find a cure for a debilitating magical illness - Tom...
body:
Prompt: Harry and Tom meet as young medi-wizards, both hoping to one day find a cure for a debilitating magical illness - Tom for the glory of it, and Harry because he wants to help people.  They end up working together on the project, since their specialities are complimentary , and for many years they make good progress though a cure us still out of reach. 

After nearly two decades, it seems like they have made a breakthrough. But Harry is beginning to have doubts regarding Tom. His friend is acting erratic, approving high risk studies and surgeries without any apparent care to the people who might be hurt. He dismisses Harry’s concerns, claiming it’s all worth it if they can find a cure. Harry isn’t sure he trusts Tom’s word. 

Following an instinct, Harry starts investigating, and discovers there have been deaths, dozens of them as Tom experimented, seemingly for no reason. Horrified, Harry decides he needs to expose Tom’s actions, and he needs to do it quick, before Tom realises he knows the truth.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.title: Dareth Shiral
blog.description: Andaran Atish’an! ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ writing when i should be sleeping & self proclaimed rot queen of armello ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ so i came here to write things and scream about dragon age and maybe share some of my art but then i learned i could make gifs i'm really proud of so hi my name's mandy and i plan to gif absolutely everything ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ please read my gifs terms of use before using them! hopefully i'll have it up soon ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ mandy • neutral good • infj • sagittarius • house stark • ravenclaw • thunderbird

harry potter and the philosopher's stone
summary: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone: The Remaining Owls I think the third one is an owl???? Honestly I have no idea, it’s...
caption:
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone: The Remaining Owls

I think the third one is an owl???? Honestly I have no idea, it’s probably a puffskein in a cup now that I look at it more but I really can’t tell so for now it’s just an honorary owl and regardless it deserves some love too. 

Anyway hi my name is Mandy and currently my goal is to gif every single creature in the Harry Potter movies (and Fantastic Beasts of course), and right now i’m tackling the owls because there really aren’t enough owl gifs at all and they’re one of my favorite animals. They also just look stunning ahhh

summary:
Gods & Monsters
 Potterverse | 1950 | Riddle Era | 1 yr.

 Have you ever wanted to be a big player in the game of life? Ever...
caption:
Gods & Monsters

Potterverse | 1950 | Riddle Era | 1 yr.

Have you ever wanted to be a big player in the game of life? Ever wanted to ride the robe-tails of someone who is literally burning their pathway to the top? Have you ever wanted to walk along side the Dark Lord and feel the power that radiates from his very core? Have you wanted all these things, but froze because you felt you might not make the cut?

Gods & Monsters encourages you to join us during our Christmas Event in the Atrium, where we have six temporary characters available for you to try on for size. 

We look forward to seeing you.
